subject: Re: [junit] junit.swingui
msgSnippet: Mike, I couldn t find an earlier response, so I wanted you to know that JUnit 4.x does not include a built-in graphical runner.  There is a project that will
messageBody:
Mike,

I couldn't find an earlier response, so I wanted you to know that JUnit
4.x does not include a built-in graphical runner. There is a project
that will include a third-party runner:

http://www.junitext.org/

Also, Eclipse 3.2 natively runs JUnit 4.0 tests.

David Saff

reliagility wrote:
> Am I missing something??? I can't find junit.swingui in the JUnit
> source. I just downloaded junit-4.0. Is junit.swingui part of an
> version or something?
>
> I can see the javadoc for this package here:
> http://junit.sourceforge.net/javadoc/junit/swingui/package-summary.html
>
> Please help! What am I missing?
>
> -Mike
>
>
>
>
